faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.contactPrefix: If you have anything else you want to ask,

howDoesItWork.question: How does Pinacle work?
howDoesItWork.answer:
Pinacle provides instant development environments that run in your browser. Simply connect your GitHub repository, choose your stack, and start coding within seconds.

Each environment includes your choice of tools like VS Code, Claude Code or Cursor CLI, a terminal, and more, all pre-configured and ready to use.

whatIsIncluded.question: What is included in a pod?
whatIsIncluded.answer: Each pod includes a full Linux environment with root access, your choice of coding tools (VS Code, Claude Code, Cursor CLI), web terminal, project management with Vibe Kanban, git integration, and support for any programming language or framework. All tools run in your browser with no local installation needed.

isDataProtected.question: Is my data protected?
isDataProtected.answer:
Yes. Your code and data remain private and secure. Each pod runs in a completely isolated and sandboxed container.

We use industry-standard encryption for data in transit and at rest. Your GitHub credentials are securely stored and never shared.

isItForMe.question: Is it for me?
isItForMe.answer:
If you're using tools like Lovable, v0, or Bolt but stuck in a prototype, Pinacle is for you. Pinacle gives you real development tools without the setup hassle and easy for you to use.

Already a developer? Pinacle helps you work on multiple projects simultaneously without cluttering your local machine. When you need to jump back into a project from two weeks ago, it's still there, running and ready, exactly how you left it.

privateRepos.question: Can I use this with my private GitHub repositories?
privateRepos.answer: Absolutely! Pinacle integrates seamlessly with GitHub. You can clone existing repositories or create new ones directly from the setup flow. We use GitHub Apps for secure authentication and support both personal and organization repositories.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer:
Pinacle charges based on usage time and resource tier. You only pay for the time your pods are running. You can start, stop, and delete pods at any time.

We offer different tiers (small, medium, large, xlarge) to match your project needs. See our pricing page for detailed rates.

installDependencies.question: Can I install any dependencies?
installDependencies.answer: Yes! You have full root access in your pod. Install any packages, dependencies, or tools you need using apk, pnpm, uv, or any other package manager. Your install commands can be saved in your pinacle.yaml for automatic setup on new pods.

stopPod.question: What happens to my work when I stop a pod?
stopPod.answer:
We create automatic snapshots of your pod's state once you stop it, so you can restore it later. Snapshots incur a small storage cost, but you can delete them at any time.

Should you delete the pod and snapshot, committed changes remain of course safely stored on GitHub, along with a pinacle.yaml file that allows you to recreate your pod's environment later.

multipleServices.question: Can I run multiple services?
multipleServices.answer: Yes! Pinacle supports running multiple services and processes simultaneously. Start your frontend, backend, database, and any other services you need. Each gets its own port, and you can access them all through our built-in proxy.

configuration.question: Do I need to configure anything?
configuration.answer:
Not for most projects! Pinacle automatically configures everything for you.

For advanced customization, you can use pinacle.yaml to define services, processes, environment variables, and startup commands.

footer.description: Secure, scalable AI development environments. You can just do things.

paymentSuccess.preview: Payment successful - Your pods are running smoothly
paymentSuccess.subject: Payment Received - {currency} {amount}
paymentSuccess.title: payment received
paymentSuccess.body1: Your payment of {currency} {amount} was processed successfully.
paymentSuccess.body2: Your pods will continue running without interruption. Thanks for being with us.

checkoutRecovery.subjectAttempt3: Last chance - Your Pinacle pod setup
checkoutRecovery.body1: We noticed you started setting up your {tier} development pod but didn't complete the checkout process.
checkoutRecovery.body2: Your configuration is still saved! Click the button below to complete your setup and get your development environment running in minutes.
checkoutRecovery.body3: Your {tier} pod configuration is still waiting for you. We'd hate to see you miss out on having your own fully-configured development environment.
checkoutRecovery.body4: Need help? Have questions? Just reply to this email and we'll be happy to assist!
checkoutRecovery.body5: This is our last reminder about your {tier} pod setup. After this, we'll clear your saved configuration.
checkoutRecovery.body6: If you're not ready yet, no worries! You can always start a new setup anytime. But if you want to continue where you left off, click below now.
checkoutRecovery.footer: Not interested? No problem! You can ignore this email.

gracePeriodWarning.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è Payment Overdue - {daysRemaining} Days Until Suspension
gracePeriodWarning.preview: {daysRemaining} hours until your pods are suspended - Action required
gracePeriodWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è payment overdue
gracePeriodWarning.body1: Your payment of {currency} {amount} is still outstanding. We've tried processing it multiple times but haven't been able to collect payment.
gracePeriodWarning.body2: You have {daysRemaining} hour(s) remaining before your pods are suspended and you lose access to them.
gracePeriodWarning.body4: If you update your payment method: Your pods will continue running normally.
gracePeriodWarning.body5: If payment isn't received: Your pods will be suspended in {daysRemaining} day(s). You won't be able to access them until payment is made.
gracePeriodWarning.body6: This is an automated reminder. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.

finalDeletionWarning.subject: üö® Final Warning - Data Deletion in {daysUntilDeletion} Days
finalDeletionWarning.preview: Final warning: Your data will be deleted in {daysUntilDeletion} days
finalDeletionWarning.title: üö® final warning
finalDeletionWarning.body2: Your pods have been suspended for an extended period. In {daysUntilDeletion} day(s), all your data will be permanently deleted:
finalDeletionWarning.body7: To prevent deletion and restore access to your pods:
finalDeletionWarning.body8: 1. Click the button above to visit your billing dashboard
finalDeletionWarning.body10: 3. Your pods will be restored immediately after payment
finalDeletionWarning.body11: If you meant to cancel your subscription, you can ignore this email. Your data will be deleted as scheduled.
finalDeletionWarning.body12: Questions? Reply to this email and we'll help.

subscriptionCancelled.subject: Subscription Cancelled
subscriptionCancelled.title: subscription cancelled
subscriptionCancelled.body1: Your subscription has been cancelled. All your pods have been stopped and won't incur any more charges.
subscriptionCancelled.body2: Your data will be kept for {dataRetentionDays} days. If you reactivate your subscription before then, everything will be exactly as you left it.
subscriptionCancelled.body3: After {dataRetentionDays} days, your pods and snapshots will be permanently deleted.
subscriptionCancelled.body4: We're sorry to see you go. If there's anything we could have done better, please reply to this email and let us know.
subscriptionCancelled.body5: Questions? Reply to this email and we'll help.

paymentFailed.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è Payment Failed - Action Required
paymentFailed.preview: Payment failed - Action required to keep your pods running
paymentFailed.title: payment failed
paymentFailed.body1: We couldn't process your payment of {currency} {amount}. This is usually because:
paymentFailed.body2: ‚Ä¢ Your card expired or was declined
paymentFailed.body4: ‚Ä¢ Your card issuer blocked the transaction
paymentFailed.body5: Your pods are still running for the next 24 hours. After that, they'll be suspended until payment is received.
paymentFailed.body6: Stripe will automatically retry your payment. You can also update your payment method in your billing dashboard to resolve this immediately.
